text: Xuelin has been a happy place for my 2 kids in learning Chinese. The teachers have been great to adjust the pace of learning to suit their needs. And I get feedback from the teachers after classes.
I feel that the teachers are very dedicated to teaching us and give constructive feedback when marking the compositions and open ended questions.
The Teachers here are very experienced and they help the students, including me, to do well in their studies.
Highly recommend Chinese learning school ！ Teachers are very patient and professional.
All of the teachers in Xuelin are very patient and professional.
